Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Joseph the Carpenter:

Text.Language: Wouniatk qen oumeym/i: peniwt e#y#u# n~dikeoc: abba Iwc/f pihamse: pimenrit n~te P,#c#.
Blessed are you indeed, our father the righteous Saint, Abba Joseph the carpenter, the beloved of Christ.
